column2: "Not bad, <%me>. You got me the smooth stones I need. Thanks!"
"Yes, this is it, yes! I wanted this!"
"Hm? What will I use them for? Tsk, shame on you for asking. A lady's got to have her secrets, you know."
"Now, let's just forget about that, shall we? My heartfelt gratitude should be more than enough for you."
